p: The group activity bioassays were performed for the treated and untreated larvae of the 2 nd, 3 rd, 4 th and 5 th instar of each population. Ten replicates (i.e., groups of 10 larvae each) were used for each combination of instar and concentration. The general activity of the group (including walking, interaction between larvae, and movements of the body parts) within the arena was recorded for 10â€‰min.
